subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As a former N.B.A. point guard, Dallas Mavericks Coach Avery Johnson has learned to appreciate Jason Terry for his toughness, his talent and for not being the prototypical point guard.
snippet: As a former N.B.A. point guard, Dallas Mavericks Coach Avery Johnson has learned to appreciate Jason Terry for his toughness, his talent and for not being the prototypical point guard.
